# allowedTouchTypes

**Instance Property**

The types of touch interactions the view allows.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var allowedTouchTypes: NSTouch.TouchTypeMask { get set }
```

## Handling Touch Events

- **wantsRestingTouches**: A Boolean value indicating whether the view wants resting touches.
- **candidateListTouchBarItem**
